room_title: Escape room "R.E.S.C.U.E." by Denver Escape Room in Denver
review: SO FUN! GO DO IT! Well, if you like puzzles. I honestly have not had that much fun in a long time. I felt like a kid again! Except for the fact that I would not have been much help as a kid.We got there and the place was a little difficult to find. They had signs posted everywhere but we went at night and the signs are black. We did see it though so we got there! The staff was very nice and answered all of my random, obnoxious questions because I always have some. While we were waiting, we were messing around with some brain teasers. I heard lots of yelling and banging so I was kind of freaking out but it wasn't scary.We did RESCUE which has a 3.3% success rate. We thought we were smart and were going to get out just fine. Even if it was our first one. NOPE! We technically did escape and saved the girl. Just 20 seconds after the bomb went off...as ghosts. This is definitely a fun puzzle game and I can't wait to do another one! Our whole groups loves thinking outside the box so I think that helped up out and hindered us as we were thinking too outside the box sometimes!

room_title: Escape room "R.E.S.C.U.E." by Denver Escape Room in Denver
review: We attempted the "RESCUE" Escape Room. The puzzles were well thought-out and challenging. The rooms and office were tidy and the staff were very friendly and professional. I would highly recommend Denver Escape Room!

room_title: Escape room "R.E.S.C.U.E." by Denver Escape Room in Denver
review: Really this place has the kindest people who are all very excited about their jobs! They have been kind and accommodating both of our times. We look forward to coming back again and again! Thank you so much Denver Escape room!
